channel.title: Abouts on I'm Kernel Dev
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on I'm Kernel Dev

item.title: Me
item.description: I do many things like managing teams, programs but at heart I am a software engineer who always aspired to be a Kernel Developer. Am I a Kernel Developer now? No, not at all, not even close! The day I become a Kernel Developer is when I will reveal my true identity until such a point I would like to operate under this pseudo-name imkernel. This site is a reflection of what I want to be eventually as a programmer.
